column2: westfore3721@aol., 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
teresa, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: It helped me get to sleep instead of having to take Ambien all the time. Great OTC pill.

column2: Izewdeopen, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: These work great for getting and keeping me to sleep. I am concerned about side-effects though, especially liver damage. These are not suppose to be taken long-term and I was not aware of that. I am going to use "Moondrops" because they are not harmful and they work. I do have to take three or four of them though because they are not as strong as lab drugs. I want to be able to fall asleep as naturally as possible and not have to worry about liver damage.

column2: Rick, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: It has worked for me. but I just can't take it all the time because it'll stop working as well. Rotate with other over the counter sleep aids

column2: 19-24 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: work nights, do stuff during days, so on days off i change my sleep schedule to nightswhich is easy but then i need to sleep during the day to work that night and cant always fall asleep early enough or at all. so i take these and i love them. works for me in an hour or two but sleep like a baby and no groggyness even if i didnt get 8 hrs.

column2: dotdeeshe, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Great Sleep experience.  Worked within 15 min. - 1/2 hr.

column2: jellybeanempress, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Within an hour of taking the recommended dose, I started to feel "tired".  I could tell it wasn't real but my body was going through the motions of sleepiness. I went down for the count an hour or so later, slept like I haven't slept in years.  I woke up feeling refreshed.  No side effects for me at all.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I cannot go to sleep.  I wake up many times during the night but this does seem to help some.

column2: Katherine, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I'm a chronic insomniac and I've tried every trick in the book to fall asleep, but nothing worked. I took two of the "Simply Sleep" pills and was out cold in an hour. No grogginess the next morning... the only side effect I experienced was bad cottonmouth, but that went away after drinking a glass of water.
